meta.name: description
meta.content: JTreeMap is a Java Swing component which reprensents hierarchical structure in a Treemap/heatmap, released under the business-friendly Apache 2.0 license.

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: TreeMap, HeatMap, Swing component, java, open source

section.name: JTreemap Introduction
section.p: JTreeMap is a Java Swing component which reprensents hierarchical structure in a Treemap/heatmap.
Check out the UML diagrams here
Also look at the Project Reports menu on the left for project specific items, unit tests, QA etc.
